member.name: T:PayWithAmazon.Client
member.summary: Class Client Takes configuration information Makes API calls to MWS for Pay With Amazon returns Request Object

member.summary: Takes the Configuration Object of the Configuration class

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Takes user configuration from the JSON file path provided and convert it to Hashtable config Validates the user configuration Hashtable against existing config Hashtable

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.SetMwsTestUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Setter for MWS Service URL for unit testing

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.GetParameters
member.summary: Sets the value for the parameters string for unit testing

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.SetTimeStamp(System.String)
member.summary: Setter for Timestamp Set the Timestamp for unit testing

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.SetParametersAndPost(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: SetParametersAndPost - sets the parameters Dictionary that will be used to Post to MWS with non empty values from the requestParameters Dictionary sent to API calls. If Provider Credit Details is present, values are set by setProviderCreditDetails If Provider Credit Reversal Details is present, values are set by setProviderCreditDetails

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.CalculateSignatureAndPost(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: CalculateSignatureAndPost - convert the Parameters Dictionary to string and POST the parameters to MWS

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.SetDefaultValues(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: If Merchant ID is not set via the requestParameters Dictionary then it's taken from the configuration object Set the Platform ID set in the configuration object and if value is null in the requestParameters Set the Currency Code if set in the configuration object and if value is null in the requestParameters

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.SetProviderCreditDetails(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: SetProviderCreditDetails - sets the provider credit details sent via the Capture or Authorize API calls

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.SetProviderCreditReversalDetails(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: SetProviderCreditReversalDetails - sets the reverse provider credit details sent via the Refund API call.

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.GetUserInfo(System.String)
member.summary: GetUserInfo convenience function - Returns user's profile information from Amazon using the access token returned by the Button widget.
member.returns: string response - json output of profile information

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.GetOrderReferenceDetails(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.GetOrderReferenceDetailsRequest)
member.summary: GetOrderReferenceDetails API call - Returns details about the order reference object and its current state.

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.SetOrderReferenceDetails(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.SetOrderReferenceDetailsRequest)
member.summary: SetOrderReferenceDetails API call - Sets order reference details such as the order total and a description for the order. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751960

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.ConfirmOrderReference(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.ConfirmOrderReferenceRequest)
member.summary: ConfirmOrderReference API call - Confirms that the order reference is free of constraints and all required information has been set on the order reference. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751980

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.CancelOrderReference(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.CancelOrderReferenceRequest)
member.summary: CancelOrderReferenceDetails API call - Cancels a previously confirmed order reference. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751990"

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.CloseOrderReference(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.CloseOrderReferenceRequest)
member.summary: CloseOrderReference API call - Confirms that an order reference has been fulfilled (fully or partially) https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752000

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.CloseAuthorization(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.CloseAuthorizationRequest)
member.summary: CloseAuthorization API call - Closes an authorization. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752070

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.Authorize(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.AuthorizeRequest)
member.summary: Authorize API call - Reserves a specified amount against the payment method(s) stored in the order reference. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752010

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.GetAuthorizationDetails(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.GetAuthorizationDetailsRequest)
member.summary: GetAuthorizationDetails API call - Returns the status of a particular authorization and the total amount captured on the authorization. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752030

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.Capture(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.CaptureRequest)
member.summary: Capture API call - Captures funds from an authorized payment instrument https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752040

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.GetCaptureDetails(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.GetCaptureDetailsRequest)
member.summary: GetCaptureDetails API call - Returns the status of a particular capture and the total amount refunded on the capture. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752060

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.Refund(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.RefundRequest)
member.summary: Refund API call - Refunds a previously captured amount. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752080

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.GetRefundDetails(PayWithAmazon.StandardPaymentRequests.GetRefundDetailsRequest)
member.summary: GetRefundDetails API call - Returns the status of a particular refund. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752100

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.GetServiceStatus(PayWithAmazon.CommonRequests.GetServiceStatusRequest)
member.summary: GetServiceStatus API Call - Returns the operational status of the Off-Amazon Payments API section section of Amazon Marketplace Web Service (Amazon MWS). Status values are GREEN, GREEN_I, YELLOW, and RED. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201752110

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.CreateOrderReferenceForId(PayWithAmazon.RecurringPaymentRequests.CreateOrderReferenceForIdRequest)
member.summary: CreateOrderReferenceForId API Call - Creates an order reference for the given object https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751670

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.GetBillingAgreementDetails(PayWithAmazon.RecurringPaymentRequests.GetBillingAgreementDetailsRequest)
member.summary: GetBillingAgreementDetails API Call - Returns details about the billing agreement object and its current state. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751690

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.SetBillingAgreementDetails(PayWithAmazon.RecurringPaymentRequests.SetBillingAgreementDetailsRequest)
member.summary: SetBillingAgreementDetails API call - Sets billing agreement details such as a description of the agreement and other information about the seller. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751700

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.ConfirmBillingAgreement(PayWithAmazon.RecurringPaymentRequests.ConfirmBillingAgreementRequest)
member.summary: ConfirmBillingAgreement API Call - Confirms that the billing agreement is free of constraints and all required information has been set on the billing agreement. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751710

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.ValidateBillingAgreement(PayWithAmazon.RecurringPaymentRequests.ValidateBillingAgreementRequest)
member.summary: ValidateBillignAgreement API Call - Validates the status of the billing agreement object and the payment method associated with it. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751720

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.AuthorizeOnBillingAgreement(PayWithAmazon.RecurringPaymentRequests.AuthorizeOnBillingAgreementRequest)
member.summary: AuthorizeOnBillingAgreement API call - Reserves a specified amount against the payment method(s) stored in the billing agreement. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751940

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Client.CloseBillingAgreement(PayWithAmazon.RecurringPaymentRequests.CloseBillingAgreementRequest)
member.summary: CloseBillingAgreement API Call - Returns details about the billing agreement object and its current state. https://payments.amazon.com/documentation/apireference/201751950

member.name: T:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler
member.summary: Class IPN_Handler Takes headers and body of the IPN message as input in the constructor verifies that the IPN is from the right resource and has the valid data

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.#ctor(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.String)
member.summary: IpnHandler takes Ipn Headers and JSON data

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.ParseRawMessage(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.String)
member.summary:
Convert a raw http POST request that contains an IPN and convert to an object
Will throw a Exception if the content is not a valid IPN
Callers are expected to return a 503 http code an exception is thrown by this method, otherwise reply with a HTTP OK status

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.ParseNotification(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection,System.String)
member.summary: Parse a json string in an sns format and convert it into a message object that stores key/value pairs

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.ValidateHeader(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Check the sns headers to ensure that the notification is valid

member.summary: Ensure that the sns message is the valid notificaton type

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.parseMessage(System.String)
member.summary: Create a new message the acts as a wrapper around the json string

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.GetMandatoryField(System.String)
member.summary: Return the value associated with the field name, throws an exception if it cannot be found

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.GetMandatoryFieldAsDateTime(System.String)
member.summary: Return the value of the field as a timestamp

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.GetValueAsToken(System.String)
member.summary: Return the JToken associated with this field, otherwise throw an exception

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.GetField(System.String)
member.summary: Get the value associated with this field, or return null if not present
member.returns: String or null if not defined

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.ValidateMessageIsTrusted
member.summary: Validates if the Signature version is correct , else throws an exception

member.summary: Invoke the version 1 signature algorithm and throw an exception if it fails

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.VerifyMsgMatchesSignatureV1WithCert
member.summary: Perform the comparison of the message data with the signature, as described on http://docs.aws.amazon.com/sns/latest/dg/SendMessageToHttp.verify.signature.html, for version 1 of the signature algorithm

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.VerifyCertIsIssuedByAmazon
member.summary: Verify that certificate is valid and issued by Amazon.

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.VerifyCertificateSubject(System.String)
member.summary: Verify the certificate subject, checks the "CN" attribute
member.returns: value of the attribute or false

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.VerifyMsgMatchesSignatureWithPublicCert(System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Perform the comparison of the message data with the signature

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.IpnHandler.GetCertificate(System.String)
member.summary: Check the application cache for the certificate, and use this if still valid If not found, request the cert and add to the cache with a timeout of 24 hours

member.summary: Request the certifcate from the given URI

member.name: M:PayWithAmazon.Responses.AuthorizeResponse.ParseDictionaryToVariables(System.Collections.IDictionary)
member.summary: Flattening the Dictionary The input dictionary contains key value pairs in the below format Type 1. Key (string) , Value (string) Type 2.
